section.64: Military Expeditions led by the Prophet (pbuh) (Al-Maghaazi)

hadiths.text: Narrated Sulaiman bin Surd:When the clans were driven away, I heard the Prophet (ï·º) saying, "From now onwards we will go to attack them (i.e. the infidels) and they will not come to attack us, but we will go to them
